allow: Bash(node -e "const mongoose = require(''mongoose''); mongoose.connect(''mongodb+srv://miguellopez_db_user:JefesFrente2024@sjt.jn8vcf6.mongodb.net/NOVUM'').then(async () => { const User = mongoose.model(''User'', new mongoose.Schema({}, { strict: false })); const count = await User.countDocuments(); console.log(''Usuarios en DB:'', count); process.exit(0); })")

Bash(node -e "const mongoose = require(''mongoose''); mongoose.connect(''mongodb+srv://miguellopez_db_user:JefesFrente2024@sjt.jn8vcf6.mongodb.net/NOVUM'').then(async () => { const User = mongoose.model(''User'', new mongoose.Schema({}, { strict: false })); const users = await User.find({}, ''email role'').limit(10); users.forEach(u => console.log(u.email, ''-'', u.role)); process.exit(0); })")

Bash(node -e "const mongoose = require(''mongoose''); const bcrypt = require(''bcryptjs''); mongoose.connect(''mongodb+srv://miguellopez_db_user:JefesFrente2024@sjt.jn8vcf6.mongodb.net/NOVUM'').then(async () => { const User = mongoose.model(''User'', new mongoose.Schema({}, { strict: false })); const passwords = { ''admin@novum.com'': ''Admin123!'', ''compras@novum.com'': ''Compras123!'', ''finanzas@novum.com'': ''Finanzas123!'', ''aprobador@novum.com'': ''Aprobador123!'', ''almacen@novum.com'': ''Almacen123!'', ''solicitante@novum.com'': ''Solicitante123!'' }; for (const [email, pass] of Object.entries(passwords)) { const hash = await bcrypt.hash(pass, 12); await User.updateOne({ email }, { password: hash }); console.log(''Updated:'', email); } console.log(''âœ… Passwords updated!''); process.exit(0); })")
